sz,Eswatini,Weather,6001,1,749083919,Weather Live° - Local Forecast,Mosaic S.r.l.,https://apps.apple.com/sz/app/weather-live-local-forecast/id749083919?uo=4,0.0,4.58406,113,Weather,"With Weather Live°, planning your day-to-day activities is easier than ever before: simply choose the weather parameters you want to track, which layout you prefer, and view your customized weather forecast! Feast your eyes on the breathtaking weather backgrounds that make the forecast as visual as nature itself.
WEATHER AT A GLANCE
- Accurate forecasts for today and the week ahead with local times for multiple locations, worldwide
- Animated weather scenes reflecting weather conditions
- Bad weather warnings and alerts to give you a heads up about severe weather in your area
- Adjustable weather layouts — choose which weather parameters you’d like to see first
- Daily weather reports with important information.
INSIGHTFUL DETAILS
- Today's Min, Max and ""Feels Like"" temperature
- Pressure in inches, mm, kPa or mbar
- Precipitation and humidity info
- Wind speed and direction
- Sunrise/Sunset and Moonrise/Moonset time
- Golden hour and Blue hour
- UV and Visibility details
- Dew Point info
- Wind Chill
- Fahrenheit/Celsius and Miles/Kilometers
- 12 or 24-hour time format.
SIMPLICITY OF USE
- Useful weather widget: get the detailed temperature forecast and severe weather alerts right on your Home Screen.
- Handy Apple Watch app: view the current weather conditions and the forecast for the coming hours right on your watch face.
Get Weather Live° and be prepared for any weather!
Please note that some supplementary features in the basic (free) version are subject to limitations (ex. UV index, Sun and Moon, Visibility, etc.). These limitations are also subject to change.
Get Weather Live° Premium:
- 14-day hourly forecast
- Interactive weather maps
- Hurricane Tracker
- Lightning Tracker
- Lock & Home Screen widgets
- Min-by-min precipitation chart as a Live Activity
- Air Quality
- RainScope
- Ability to rearrange the blocks with weather details
- Ad-free experience.

Subscription payments will be charged to your App Store account at confirmation of your purchase.  Subscriptions will automatically renew and you will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off or unless you cancel at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription or trial period.  Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period. The cost of renewal depends on the Subscription Plan you choose.
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase or by contacting Customer Support.
IMPORTANT DISCLOSURES AND CONSENT

If you live in the European Union and wish to cancel your order, you may do so within 14 days. You can do this by following the process laid out in the Apple App Store. Please note and acknowledge: you cannot cancel your order or obtain a refund if you have downloaded the app and started using it (i.e. for example, by opening and using the App).
Privacy Policy: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html
EULA: http://www.apalon.com/terms_of_use.html
AdChoices: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#4",2013-11-26T01:50:35Z,2025-11-12T09:52:08Z

sz,Eswatini,Weather,6001,2,295646461,Weather - The Weather Channel,The Weather Channel,https://apps.apple.com/sz/app/weather-the-weather-channel/id295646461?uo=4,0.0,4.5,2,Weather,"The Weather Channel is the World's Most Accurate Forecaster*. With extreme weather on the rise, prepare yourself for storms, hurricanes & wildfires. Track daily forecasts and receive live radar updates, storm alerts, & local precipitation updates.

Our live Doppler radar maps, storm watch, and hurricane tracker can warn you ahead of time of severe storms, heavy rain, heat waves, or an incoming flood. Receive your forecast updates and rest assured with our weather warnings. Severe weather is increasing - our severe weather alerts have you covered.

Plan up to 15 days in advance with forecasts from the World’s Most Accurate Weather Forecaster, so you can plan ahead with confidence*. Manage personal weather alerts, so you receive notifications that are important to you.
Download The Weather Channel to get you through storm season, hurricane season & extreme weather warnings.
The Weather Channel Features:
Today’s Weather Forecast:
- 15-minute forecast for rain intensity up to 7 hours in the future & radar on your homescreen
- Check weather forecasts up to two weeks in advance!
- Prepare for severe storms & hurricane season
- Monitor breathing conditions with our Air Quality Index forecast
Widget & Homescreen Features:
- Our smart widget offers more weather in detail at a glance and one-tap access to the forecast
- Check your local radar, get severe weather alerts in your area, and check the forecast for the next three hours on your homescreen
Additional Features:
- Detailed information on sunset times
- Stay prepared during extreme weather events, hurricanes, and earthquakes with live breaking news alerts
Upgrade to The Weather Channel Premium for our most comprehensive, dynamic, and precise weather experience available. Exclusive access to:
- Ad-free weather
- 15-minute forecast details
- Advanced 72-Hour Future Radar
- and more!

You can cancel The Weather Channel subscription anytime through your App Store account settings, or it will automatically renew. This must be done 24 hours before the end of any subscription period to avoid being charged another fee. Subscription payments will be charged to your App Store account at confirmation of your purchase and upon commencement of each renewal term. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.
Privacy & Feedback
•Our Privacy Policy can be viewed here: https://weather.com/en-US/twc/privacy-policy
•Our Terms of Use can be viewed here: http://www.weather.com/common/home/legal.html
•If you have any questions or suggestions about our weather service, please do not hesitate to get in touch at iphonesupport@weather.com

*The Weather Channel is the World's Most Accurate Forecaster. According ForecastWatch, Global and Regional Weather Forecast Accuracy Overview, 2021-2024, https://forecastwatch.com/AccuracyOverview2021-2024, commissioned by The Weather Company.

**The Weather Channel is the Most Trusted News Source In America. According to a YouGov 2024 Trust in Media poll: https://today.yougov.com/politics/articles/49552-trust-in-media-2024-which-news-outlets-americans-trust
The Weather Channel® is a registered trademark of The Weather Company, LLC 2024",2012-06-01T13:55:01Z,2025-11-20T12:31:11Z

sz,Eswatini,Weather,6001,3,975709372,My Earthquake Alerts & Feed,JRustonApps B.V.,https://apps.apple.com/sz/app/my-earthquake-alerts-feed/id975709372?uo=4,0.0,5,2,Weather,"My Earthquake Alerts is a powerful earthquake monitoring app which delivers all of the information you need, with push notifications included, all free of charge. It also includes a beautifully simple design optimized for the latest iPhone and iPad.
FEATURES
- Live earthquake map which can detect and track earthquakes from all around the world.
- Free earthquake alerts customized for you, with no restrictions.
- Powerful search feature to find earthquake history dating back to 1970!
- Beautiful & simple design - view the earthquake feed on a map and in a list.
- Find the exact location, the depth and the distance away from you.
- Uses information from a wide variety of earthquake networks, including the USGS and EMSC.
- Support for the latest iPhone and iPad models.

If you need information or notifications about the latest earthquakes near to you, download My Earthquake Alerts today. This version is ad-supported. It is similar to apps such as Quakes, MyQuake and QuakeFeed.",2015-04-03T20:40:11Z,2025-11-19T17:42:30Z

sz,Eswatini,Weather,6001,4,486154808,Weather Underground: Local Map,"Weather Underground, LLC",https://apps.apple.com/sz/app/weather-underground-local-map/id486154808?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Weather,"Discover a reliable, real-time and hyper-local forecast that will always warn you about upcoming severe weather. Weather Underground combines data from over 250,000+ personal weather stations and a proprietary forecast model to give you the most accurate and hyperlocal forecasts, at a microclimate level. Discover about current conditions, interactive Nexrad radar, get customizable severe weather alerts and much more. You’ll always be prepared for whatever the weather brings.
5 REASONS TO DOWNLOAD WEATHER UNDERGROUND
• Severe weather alerts: set weather alerts for your exact position, so you can always be prepared for an upcoming storm!

• Local conditions: get current weather conditions from local weather stations and hourly/daily summary forecasts up to 10 days in the future, which include chance of precipitation and daily weather summaries.

• Most detailed weather data: stay updated with the best weather data including temperature, “Feels Like,” wind speed, wind directions, today’s rain accumulation, humidity, dew point, visibility, and pressure.
• Other geographical data: discover our air quality index, UV index, local flu outbreaks, sunrise & sunset and moonrise & moonset.
• Customized experience: set your app with light & dark modes, various map types and units.
DISCOVER THE UNIQUE FEATURES OF WEATHER UNDERGROUND
• Interactive radar maps & severe weather:
• The most interactive weather map on mobile allows you to select from different weather overlays, personal weather stations, nexrad radar, satellite, heat maps, and rain accumulation.
• Sophisticated weather visualizations with hi-res satellite & cloud cover imagery from GOES-16, powered by data from NOAA.
• Keep an eye out for extreme weather and always be prepared with severe weather alerts.
Accurate hyper-local forecasts:
• Over 250,000 personal weather stations report the most accurate local weather conditions.

• Made to fill in the gaps between the airport weather stations that other weather services rely upon to generate forecasts - meaning our data is generated from actual data points in your neighborhood.
Subscribe to Premium!
• Upgrade and remove all ads from your weather app by purchasing an annual subscription.
• Access Smart Forecasts: set your ideal weather conditions for your outdoor activities and we’ll tell you when to go.
• View Extended Hourly Forecasts up to 15 days in the future.

You can cancel your Weather Underground subscription anytime through your iTunes account settings, or it will automatically renew. This must be done 24 hours before the end of any subscription period to avoid being charged another fee. Subscription payments will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of your purchase and upon commencement of each renewal term. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.
Privacy & Feedback
• Our Privacy Policy can be viewed here: https://www.wunderground.com/company/privacy-policy
• Our Terms of Use can be viewed here: https://www.wunderground.com/company/legal
• If you have any questions or suggestions about our weather service, please do not hesitate to get in touch at support@wunderground.com.",2012-06-04T03:09:36Z,2025-06-30T14:05:43Z

sz,Eswatini,Weather,6001,5,1542742219,Weather ´,Apptico,https://apps.apple.com/sz/app/weather/id1542742219?uo=4,0.0,3,1,Weather,"Get forecasts up to 16 days ahead, with detailed hour-by-hour data for the next 96 hours. Customize the experience to focus on what matters most to you — from temperature and precipitation to wind, humidity, UV index, and air quality. Explore real-time radar maps to track rain, snow, ice and cyclones in your area. Stay notified about today’s conditions and tomorrow’s outlook.
Whether you’re planning a busy week, heading outdoors, or just wondering if you’ll need a jacket, this app delivers accurate, reliable weather — fast and easy to read.
Optimized for both iPhone and iPad, with adaptive layouts to provide the best experience across all screen sizes.
# Accurate Forecasts

Stay informed with 16-day extended forecasts and 96-hour hourly breakdowns. Access key data like temperature, rain probability, wind speed and direction, cloud cover, humidity, UV index, and more — all in a single view.
# Interactive Radar Maps
Track rain, snow, ice, and cyclones in real time with high-resolution radar. Follow weather patterns around you and anticipate changes before they happen.
# Real-Time Air Quality
Keep an eye on air quality with detailed AQI readings, including PM2.5, PM10, ozone, nitrogen dioxide, carbon monoxide, and sulfur dioxide levels — updated live and presented clearly.
# Customizable Interface
Make the app your own. Choose the metrics you want to display, rearrange forecast blocks, switch between metric and imperial units, and set morning and evening weather reports at your preferred time.
# Notifications
Get timely alerts with daily summaries for the current day and upcoming forecasts — so you’re always a step ahead.
# Multiple Locations
Check the weather in all your favorite places. Your current location updates automatically using GPS, with quick access to saved locations around the world.
# Designed for Clarity
Every detail is organized for ease of use, whether you’re a casual user or a weather power user. A clean, modern interface makes checking the forecast feel effortless.
Some features, including Interactive Radar Maps and Real-Time Air Quality, are available with a paid subscription (3 days free, then $12.99/month or $29.99/year).
Privacy Policy: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/privacy-policy
Terms and Conditions: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/terms-and-conditions
EULA: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/eula",2020-12-01T08:00:00Z,2025-05-01T10:49:31Z

sz,Eswatini,Weather,6001,6,300048137,AccuWeather Weather Forecast,"AccuWeather International, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/sz/app/accuweather-weather-forecast/id300048137?uo=4,0.0,4.56757,37,Weather,"AccuWeather’s trusted free weather forecast app is at your fingertips
Internationally recognized by the World Meteorological Organization with awards making AccuWeather one of the best weather apps:
“Best User Interface and Data Representation”
“Best Weather Warnings”
“Best Design and Presentation of Information, User-Friendliness
Weather Forecasts You Can Depend On
-  Live weather forecasts - including MinuteCast® forecasts for Minute by Minute® precipitation updates
-  Local weather - including severe weather alerts, temperature, precipitation, and allergy outlooks for your day
-  WinterCast™: winter weather forecasts - giving you advanced warnings of snowfall probabilities and accumulation
-  Daily forecasts - include rain probability, cloud coverage, wind, live radar, air quality index, snowfall, and even UV index
-  Advanced weather radar - gives you up to the minute views of storm tracking, snow, rain, ice, temperature changes, and much more
-  RealFeel® & RealFeel Shade Temperature™ technology - helping you get a better sense of how the weather actually feels
Live weather with Weather Alerts

The AccuWeather forecasting and severe weather alerts you know and trust. From local weather updates to WinterCast snow alerts, get the weather forecast you can rely on. With in-depth weather news, forecast updates, free weather alerts, plus today’s forecast and much more. Find out what makes AccuWeather the best as a trusted, free weather app. It’s the weather tracker you need!
Advanced Weather Radar
Setting the standard for free weather radar:
-  The accurate weather radar you know from AccuWeather
-  Weather watches and warnings for your local area
-  RealVue™ and Enhanced RealVue™ satellite imagery looking at weather patterns from space
-  Weather radar views for water vapor, rainfall, sustained winds, and even storm surges
-  Timely tropical storm radar tracking to see where and when storms might hit
-  Current conditions maps shows temperature and RealFeel in and around your area
-  5-day precipitation outlook to see what rain, snow, and ice could be in your area
-  24-hour snowfall forecast shows detailed maps with snow accumulation and winter weather
-  Temperature contour maps show how the temperature will change over the next day
For over 10 years, the AccuWeather app has brought you the weather

This free weather app can show you snow, wind, cold, rain and more! Stay prepared with our local weather and live forecasts. From extreme humidity, severe storms, allergy info, air quality index, snow storms, and ice alerts, get live updates that matter to you. Local weather forecasts are the AccuWeather specialty.
Our weather tracker & live radar gives you Superior Accuracy™
Severe weather warnings, today’s temperature, free weather radar maps & more!
-  Get local forecasts and personalize the app depending on where you are in the world
-  Go beyond today’s weather and look 45 days ahead to ensure that you’re prepared for any weather
-  Try the MinuteCast feature for the most up to date live Minute by Minute weather forecast
-  Weather alerts, storm alerts, and more! Get trending videos from AccuWeather’s dedicated news team
-  Weather forecasting your way - a weather tracker that can filter and customize according to your preferences

Download the AccuWeather app today for free and enjoy award-winning Superior Accuracy in weather forecasting on your iPhone, Apple Watch, or other Apple device. More than just a daily forecast, try the best weather app and get more from your forecast.",2012-06-02T09:04:25Z,2025-11-06T13:12:55Z

sz,Eswatini,Weather,6001,7,1459885905,Keraunos Life Preserver,KERAUNOS SAS,https://apps.apple.com/sz/app/keraunos-life-preserver/id1459885905?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Weather,"Protect your life with cutting-edge technology during thunderstorms.

Keraunos Life Preserver is an innovative mobile app designed to help you manage lightning risk in real time. Whether you work outdoors, practice sports, or simply enjoy being outside, this tool gives you accurate and personalized information about lightning activity in your area.
Key Features:
Real-time monitoring: View both cloud-to-ground and intra-cloud lightning strikes across the national territory.
Custom alerts: Add points of interest and receive notifications about lightning risk levels in those specific locations.
Interactive map: Easily explore lightning strike locations and frequency through a user-friendly interface.
Clear risk levels: The app tells you if you're in a high, medium, or low-risk zone, empowering you to take preventive action.
How does it work?
Keraunos Life Preserver continuously analyzes atmospheric electrical activity and alerts you when there's an increased danger near your points of interest.
With this app, you can stay one step ahead of thunderstorms and reduce your exposure to risk—protecting yourself and those around you.",2019-11-08T08:00:00Z,2025-07-15T16:45:52Z

sz,Eswatini,Weather,6001,9,628677149,Yahoo Weather,Yahoo Inc.,https://apps.apple.com/sz/app/yahoo-weather/id628677149?uo=4,0.0,4.42856,7,Weather,"Experience the weather | Apple Design Award Winner

sz,Eswatini,Weather,6001,10,589772015,MeteoSwiss,Federal Office of Meteorology and Climatology MeteoSwiss,https://apps.apple.com/sz/app/meteoswiss/id589772015?uo=4,0.0,4,1,Weather,"Intuitive, personalised and innovative: the MeteoSwiss app is your comprehensive companion for all weather information in Switzerland – compact and always up to date.

Get updates on weather forecasts, current measurements, and federal natural hazard warnings. Subscribe to natural hazard warnings as push notifications for your locations, and customize the warning types and thresholds according to your preferences.
Stay informed with informative blog posts on weather and climate topics.
Detailed features:
Weather Forecasts
• Weather on-site with a 5-hour forecast for your location
• Local forecasts for all places/ZIP codes in Switzerland with an overview for the next 8 days
• Wind/temperatures at different altitudes
• Weather report for the three language regions of Switzerland, as well as possible developments for the following week, European isobar map, and road condition forecast
Weather Animations
• Measurements and forecasts of precipitation, precipitation type, wind, temperature and clouds
• Hail reporting function
• Satellite images
Natural Hazard Warnings
• All warnings on natural hazards from the Federal Authorities (severe weather, floods, avalanches, earthquakes and forest fire)
• Warning area overview on an interactive map
• Federal natural hazard bulletin
• Subscribeable warnings as push notifications for locations and warning types with individual warning thresholds
Current Measurements
• Overview of weather stations on an interactive map and list view
• Selection of various measurement data with up to 10-minute updates
Your Locations
• Search for all places/ZIP codes in Switzerland
• An easy overview of your locations: The app keeps an organised list of your relevant locations.
Meteo Reports
• Display of submitted reports and images for specific weather events from users of the MeteoSwiss app
Sports & Health
• Pollen forecast
• UV index
• Air quality
• Snow depth and fresh snow forecast
MeteoSwiss Blog
• Daily updated posts and information on weather and climate
Aviation Weather (available through in-app purchase)
• METAR/TAF Switzerland
• Aviation weather warnings Switzerland
• Windanimations Switzerland on different FL
• GAFOR Switzerland
• Text forecasts for powered flight, gliding and ballooning
• Low Level SWC Alps and Europe
• Pressure difference
• QNH – Chart
• W / T – Chart
• Wind – Barbs
• Regtherm
• Trajectories
• Emagramms
Legal basis
https://www.meteoswiss.admin.ch/about-us/legal-basis.html
Privacy Statement
https://www.meteosuisse.admin.ch/portrait/informations-juridiques/declaration-de-protection-des-donnees-de-l-app-meteoswiss.html
Terms of use (EULA)
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/",2013-02-24T19:32:29Z,2025-11-20T06:41:56Z

sz,Eswatini,Weather,6001,11,404516121,Weather⁺,Impala Studios B.V.,https://apps.apple.com/sz/app/weather/id404516121?uo=4,0.0,4.8,15,Weather,"Weather⁺ is more than just the weather! Experience the weather forecast with beautiful video backgrounds that change along the local weather conditions of your location.
FREE IN WEATHER⁺
• Forecast Daily & 3-Hourly
• Humidity, Precipitation, Pressure, Wind direction & speed
• Visibility details
• Weather Widgets - Weekly Weather (iPhone & iPad)
• Changing Video Background along with weather conditions
• Personalize your Forecast Layout screen
• Animated Flip Clock
• Split View for multitasking support
• Full Apple Watch support
SUBSCRIPTION TO PREMIUM ACCESS
•  a 100% Ad Free experience
•  Full access to all Weather Videos
•  Premium Customer Support

Subscriptions automatically renew each month 24 hours before the end of the current period and your iTunes account will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from within the app. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription. Terms & Conditions: https://impalastudios.com/terms Privacy Policy: https://impalastudios.com/privacy
CHANGE THE TIME
In the settings, you can switch between ‘Your time’ and ‘Local time.’ To switch between them, click the ‘Your time’ and ‘Local time’ options on the clock's hour section.
ADD LOCATION ON APPLE WATCH
It’s handy to know that the first location added to your list is set as the location on your Apple Watch. To edit or change this, you can reorder the cities in your location overview on your iPhone.
CHANGE MY BACKGROUND VIDEO
Unfortunately, you can’t manually select a video to play as a background. The app selects a random video from a pool of weather videos that match the weather for the report you’re currently viewing.
You can expand this pool of videos by unlocking videos in the menu screen, which is done by watching a short ad per video.
YOUR EXPERIENCE IS IMPORTANT TO US!
Please check if the answers are available in the Frequently Asked Questions app Settings.
We’re pleased with your feedback, questions, and suggestions.
Our support team is always ready to help via support@impalastudios.com.
LOVING WEATHER⁺?
Please show your support by rating us! Thank you.",2012-05-31T09:26:39Z,2025-09-18T13:46:40Z

sz,Eswatini,Weather,6001,12,1488431932,钓鱼天气预报,"Hefei Sasha Technology Co., Ltd.",https://apps.apple.com/sz/app/%E9%92%93%E9%B1%BC%E5%A4%A9%E6%B0%94%E9%A2%84%E6%8A%A5/id1488431932?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Weather,"钓鱼人专属的天气查询与钓况分析工具，精确到钓位的天气预测，融合 AI 智能分析与渔获档案管理，为钓友提供逐小时 × 未来14天的钓鱼指数预测与策略建议。更有钓点导航、渔具商城、钓友圈等丰富功能，是数百万钓鱼人信赖的智能出钓助手！
核心功能亮点
精准钓鱼指数
提供“逐小时 × 14天”钓鱼指数参考，融合温度、气压、风速风向、月相、潮汐等多因子
数据精确到钓点/钓位，真正为钓鱼场景而生
AI钓况分析卡片
发布渔获即自动生成AI分析卡片：包含鱼口预测、钓法建议、黄金时段推荐、装备匹配等
一键了解今天是否适合出钓，爆护机会如何把握
渔获记录&钓鱼图鉴
一键记录每次出钓：鱼种、钓点、时间、照片、天气情况全收录
自动生成个人出钓档案 & 渔获成长图谱
解锁图鉴成就、收藏鱼种，打造专属钓鱼履历表

sz,Eswatini,Weather,6001,14,545993260,Weather & Radar - Forecast,WetterOnline -  Meteorologische Dienstleistungen GmbH,https://apps.apple.com/sz/app/weather-radar-forecast/id545993260?uo=4,0.0,4.38889,18,Weather,"Precise forecasts and radars in Weather & Radar’s free app for the UK & Ireland:
- Hourly and daily weather forecast
- 14-day weather outlook
- Worldwide live weather map
- RainfallRadar
- TemperatureRadar & WindRadar
- Personalised notifications for your area
- Severe weather warnings & Warning Maps
- Weather Widget
- Snow & ski information
Weather App

Be up-to-date at all times with Weather & Radar’s free app! Always know whether the Sun will be out, a thunderstorm is approaching, if it’ll rain, hail or snow. The weather app will accurately display current weather conditions for your exact position and any further location worldwide.
Weather Forecast

Everything about the weather at a glance! The latest specifics on temperature, rain, probability of precipitation, snow, wind, sunshine hours, sunrise and sunset times. Detailed displays of air pressure, humidity levels and UV-Index. Plan further ahead with the 14-day weather outlook feature.
WeatherRadar

More than just your standard weather map! The enhanced radar map shows areas of cloud cover, sunshine, rainfall, snowfall, hail, fog, thunderstorms, and lightning strikes. See meteorological conditions for various locations at once. Trace the movement of cloud formations and active storms, to see, if they will hit or bypass your location. Switch to RainfallRadar and see rainfall only against a more subtle backdrop.
WindRadar & TemperatureRadar

Gone with the wind or not? Our latest feature, the WindRadar lets you track the wind, including wind direction and peak gusts. One click away you can find the TemperatureRadar, which allows you to see the temperature on a beautifully coloured map, up to 3 days ahead!
Personalised notifications

Stay ahead of the weather with personalised, local notifications. Get timely updates tailored to your exact location, helping you plan your day with confidence. From sudden downpours to sunny breaks, we keep you prepared - wherever you are!
Severe Weather Warnings & Warning Maps

Activate severe weather warnings and receive push notifications when extreme weather conditions such as winter storms, thunderstorms, lightning, high winds or snow are underway. The Warning Map lets you see where warnings have been issued - Europe-wide!
World Weather
Scheduling a trip or have a family member in another country? Save any location and see current conditions for any number of global locations at once. World weather at your fingertips!
Weather Widget
The widget displays weather information for your current location in a compact format on the home screen of your device.
Snow Info / Winter Sports
Planning a last-minute ski trip? Weather & Radar will tell you where the snow is! Access all ski and other winter sport info for major ski locations in Europe.
Use the weather app free of advertising with the in-app purchase and profit from the option to personalise your main page!

Weather & Radar Ad-free is a subscription service that will be renewed on either a monthly or a yearly basis. Payment for the subscription will be charged to the user’s Apple Account at confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. The user’s Apple account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Apple will identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of the Weather & Radar Ad-free, free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription thereof.
Terms and Conditions: https://www.weatherandradar.co.uk/apps/ios/terms-of-use/

sz,Eswatini,Weather,6001,19,1161387262,Windy.com,"Windyty, SE",https://apps.apple.com/sz/app/windy-com/id1161387262?uo=4,0.0,5,2,Weather,"A UNIQUE WEATHER FORECAST VISUALISATION

While most weather forecasting apps rely only on free global models, Windy has gone a few steps further and invested heavily in the most accurate models available, always at the highest possible resolution, to ensure accurate weather forecasts.
WEATHER RADAR & SATELLITE IMAGERY

A weather radar is the most requested tool for weather forecasting. To provide the most accurate radar imagery, we constantly expand our resources so that rain, snow, and storms don't catch you by surprise. Trusted sources include NOAA, Met Office, AROME, DWD, JMA, ACCESS, and others.
MORE THAN 50 WEATHER MAPS AND TOOLS
- Wind forecast (current speed, gusts, accumulation, models comparison, data from weather stations)
- Temperature, humidity, pressure, dew point, freezing altitude
- Rain, thunder, storms, precipitation type, CAPE-index
- Weather radar and Satellite images (blue, infrared, visible)
- Clouds, clouds tops, clouds base and visibility (LIFR, IFR, MVFR, VFR), fog
- Waves, swell, currents
- Solar activity maps (solar power, UV index, wet-bulb temperature)
- Snow depth, new snow, snow density
- NO2, PM 2.5, Aerosol, SO2, Ozone layer, Surface ozone, CO concentration, Dust mass
- Weather warnings & Extreme forecast
- Soil moisture, Moisture anomaly, Drought intensity, Fire Danger, Fuel Moisture
Available global weather models and resolution:
- ECMWF
- GFS by NOAA
- ICON by DWD
Available local weather models
- HRRR by NOAA
- NAM by NOAA
- HRDPS by MSC
- ICON-EU by DWD
- ICON-D2 by DWD
- UKV by British Met Office
- AROME-HD by Météo France
- ALADIN by CHMI
- NEMS by meteoblue
- MSM by JMA
- ACCESS-C by Australian BoM
CUSTOM WEATHER ALERTS
- Want to know about essential weather forecasts before everyone else? Set up a custom alert based on the weather in your favorite location. Whether it's wind strength, precipitation, or temperature.
HURRICANE TRACKING, STORM TRACKING

With Windy's hurricane tracking tool, you can track a hurricane's past and projected path. Windy doesn't rely on just one hurricane model but will give you all the forecasts available for a storm or hurricane.
WEATHER WIDGETS for iOS, iPadOS, MacOS

Windy serves up a quick weather overview on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, as well as live radar by NOAA, Met Office, Meteo France, DWD, JMA, ACCESS, and many other trusted sources. You can choose from several view sizes and types. 3-5 day forecast, live weather radar, live satellite, or a simple lock screen overview.
TOOLS MADE FOR PILOTS
- 16 altitude levels from the surface to 13.5km/FL450
- 50k+ Airports searchable by ICAO and IATA, including runway info, decoded & raw METARs, TAFs and NOTAMs
- Detailed Airgram and Meteogram
- Thermals forecast
- Meteogram: temperature and dew point, wind speed and wind gusts, pressure, precipitation, altitude cloud cover
- Route planner
WINDY FOR APPLE WATCH
Forecast, radar, METARs, and wind information in a small, lovely package.
Use the Apple Watch face by Windy.com to have it all on your screen anytime.
Terms of Use: https://account.windy.com/agreements/windy-terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://account.windy.com/agreements/windy-privacy-policy
GET IN TOUCH with Windy
Join us at community.windy.com to discuss weather-related topics, report bugs, or suggest a new feature. Or contact us at info@windy.com on any topic.
FOLLOW Windy ON SOCIAL MEDIA
- Facebook: facebook.com/windyforecast
- X: X.com/windycom
- Threads: https://www.threads.net/@windy_forecast
- Instagram: instagram.com/windy_forecast
- YouTube: youtube.com/@Windyforecast",2016-10-31T20:29:54Z,2025-11-03T08:13:21Z

sz,Eswatini,Weather,6001,20,474736329,AfricaWeather,Weather Intelligence Systems,https://apps.apple.com/sz/app/africaweather/id474736329?uo=4,0.0,4.8,5,Weather,"AfricaWeather, the leaders in accurate weather intelligence services.

DATA SOURCES

sz,Eswatini,Weather,6001,21,887941884,SRF Meteo - Wetter Schweiz,Schweizer Radio und Fernsehen (SRF),https://apps.apple.com/sz/app/srf-meteo-wetter-schweiz/id887941884?uo=4,0.0,5,2,Weather,"Informieren Sie sich mit der SRF Meteo App schnell und verlässlich über das Wetter in der Schweiz und der ganzen Welt. Speichern Sie Ihre Lieblingsorte als Favoriten und behalten Sie das Wetter jederzeit im Überblick. Mit dem dreimal täglich aktualisierten Wetterbericht der SRF Meteo Redaktion sind Sie stets auf dem Laufenden über die Wetterprognose für die Schweiz.

Interaktive Wetterkarten ermöglichen es Ihnen, die aktuellen Wetterbedingungen und Vorhersagen genauer zu analysieren. Der SRF Meteo Niederschlagsradar zeigt Ihnen die Entwicklung der letzten 24 Stunden sowie die Modellprognose der kommenden 48 Stunden. Unsere saisonalen Wetterkarten bieten Informationen zu Pollen, Badewetter, Surfwetter, Segelwetter und Blattverfärbungsprognose. Während den Wintermonaten finden Sie in der SRF Meteo App die Schneewetter-Karte mit aktueller Schneehöhe, Neuschneehöhe und Lawinengefahr.
Nutzen Sie dank unseren Widgets das aktuelle Wetter von SRF Meteo kompakt auf dem Startbildschirm Ihres Smartphones.

Im Bereich «Hintergrund» werden aktuelle Wetterphänomene durch Ihre SRF Meteo Expert:innen eingeordnet und erklärt. Zudem können Sie in unserer Meteo Galerie die schönsten Wetterbilder und Wettervideos unserer User entdecken.
Mit über 30 in der ganzen Schweiz verteilten Webcams machen Sie sich ein Bild über das aktuelle Wetter.
Bei Gewitter und anderen Unwettern an Ihren bevorzugten Schweizer Orten und Ihrem Standort werden Sie per Pushmeldungen und direkt in der App mithilfe der Wetterwarnungen alarmiert.
WESENTLICHE FUNKTIONEN:
• Alle relevanten Wetterinformationen auf einen Blick
• Vorhersage und Wetterbericht für die ganze Schweiz
• Lokale Prognosen im Tagesverlauf für nationale und internationale Orte
• Niederschlagsradar zeigt die Entwicklung der letzten 24h sowie der kommenden 48h
• Interaktive und zoombare Wetterkarten
• Widgets mit aktuellen Wetterinformationen zu Ihren Favoriten und Ihrem Standort
• Aktueller Schneebericht mit Schneehöhe, Neuschneehöhe und Lawinengefahr (saisonal)
• Informationen zur Gesamtbelastung durch Pollen (saisonal)
• Über 30 Webcams zeigen in Echtzeit das Wetter in der Schweiz
• Speichern Sie Ihre Lieblingsorte als Favoriten
• Wetterwarnungen per Push-Meldung und direkt in Ihrer App
• Hintergründe und Wissenswertes zur aktuellen Wetterlage
• Infos zu den SRF Meteo Expert:innen
• Darkmode passend zu Ihren Systemeinstellungen oder nach Ihren Bedürfnissen einstellbar
• Werbefrei
Gefällt Ihnen die SRF Meteo App? Dann nehmen Sie sich doch ein paar Minuten Zeit für eine Bewertung. Wir berücksichtigen Ihr Feedback bei der Weiterentwicklung.
Bei Problemen mit der SRF Meteo App wenden Sie sich bitte an den SRF Kundendienst via https://www.srf.ch/kontakt oder Telefon (+41 848 80 80 80).",2014-07-21T07:00:00Z,2025-11-19T13:57:41Z

sz,Eswatini,Weather,6001,23,997079492,Windy.app - Wind & Weather,Windy Weather World Inc,https://apps.apple.com/sz/app/windy-app-wind-weather/id997079492?uo=4,0.0,4.66667,6,Weather,"Windy.app - wind, waves and weather forecast app for surfers, kitesurfers, windsurfers, sailors, fishermen and other wind sports.
FEATURES:
•  Wind report, forecast and statistics: wind map, accurate wind compass, wind meter, wind gusts and wind directions. It’s very useful for extreme wind sports.
•  Wind alert: Set up windalert and be aware of wind, storm and tornado warning via push-notifications
•  Weather history (archive) for 2012-2024: view wind data, temperature (day and night) and atmospheric pressure. Weather archive will help you to choose the best month for travel to the spot.

•  Local forecast from NOAA: temperature in Celsius, Fahrenheit and Kelvin, humidity, wind speed, precipitation (rain and snow). Forecast for 10 days with 3 hours step in metric or imperial units: m/s (mps), mph, km/h, knt (knout), bft (beaufort), m, ft, mm, cm, in, hPa, inHg. NOAA is a National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration / National Weather Service (nws).
•  Wave forecast: ocean or sea conditions, ocean waves and sea swell, fishing forecast
•  Animated wind tracker: weather radar for sailing, yachting and kiting in light wind
•  Cloud base/Dewpoint (dew point) data: necessary weather information for pleasant paragliding
•  Spots: over 30.000 spots sorted and located by the type and area. Add your spots to favourites.
•  Spot chats. Got anemometer? Share info about weather conditions and wind direction in the chat from a kite spot.
•  Community: exchange weather reports on the spot. Want to be a local/spot leader? Email us the name of your spot at feedback@catchwind.co and we will create a chat for it.
•  Weather Stations: online data from nearby online weather stations.
•  Offline Mode: activate offline mode and check the forecast for your activities without internet connection.

WINDY PRO Account auto-renewable subscription allows using all functions of this app. Subscription length periods: 1 month with 3 days free trial, and 1 year with 7 days free trial.

Payment for WINDY PRO Account subscriptions will be charged to your iTunes account at the time of purchase. Your subscription will be automatically renewed every 30 or 365 days. If you have never subscribed to a monthly Premium account subscription before, you will have the option of getting a free 3/7-day trial period. Cancelling the trial period will immediately disable your subscription.

Payment for subscription renewals will be charged to your account within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can disable subscription renewal in your iTunes account settings on your device.
